key_events.description: Taesa's Q3 2025 regulatory net profit increased 5.2% year-over-year to R$323 million. Regulatory EBITDA was R$549 million, a 12.6% year-over-year increase, exceeding estimates. Revenue increased by 9.8%.
Taesa announced the energization of the São Pedro reinforcement project on January 9, 2026.
Taesa paid JCP of R$0.17298440 on 2026-01-28, with declaration date of 2025-01-28 and JCP of R$0.13980241 on 2026-01-28, with declaration date of 2025-11-14.

key_events.event_name: Q4 and Full Year 2025 Results Videoconference
key_events.description: Taesa will discuss Q4 2025 and Full Year 2025 results in a videoconference on March 18, 2026.
Taesa will release Q1 2026 results on May 6, 2026.

risk_factors: Potential reliance on CDI in 2026 due to potentially negative free cash flow.
Possible need for debt issuance to maintain operations in 2026.

investment_thesis.bull_case: Potential dividend yield of 6-8% for 2026. 'Preço teto' (ceiling price) for TAEE3/TAEE4 is R$16.55, offering a potential 17% safety margin. Leverage could decrease in coming years as capital expenditure reduces.
investment_thesis.bear_case: Potential negative free cash flow in 2026 may require debt issuance. Reliance on CDI could increase. TAEE3 was trading at R$14.23 on January 28, 2026, below the 'preço justo' (fair price) of R$16.23 for TAEE4.

summary_markdown: TAEE3's Q3 2025 regulatory net profit was R$323 million, up 5.2% year-over-year. Regulatory EBITDA was R$549 million, exceeding the IBES/LSEG estimate of R$515 million, a 12.6% increase. Revenue increased 9.8%. Taesa announced the energization of the São Pedro reinforcement project on January 9, 2026. Taesa paid JCP of R$0.17298440 on 2026-01-28 and JCP of R$0.13980241 on 2026-01-28. Results for Q4 2025 and Full Year 2025 will be discussed on March 18, 2026, and Q1 2026 results will be released on May 6, 2026. Analysts predict a 6-8% dividend yield for 2026. The 'preço teto' for TAEE3/TAEE4 is R$16.55. TAEE3 was trading at R$14.23 on January 28, 2026. TAEE4 'preço justo' is R$16.23.
